frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-disable-unredirect-fullscreen-windows
frozen.shortDescription: Disables unredirect fullscreen windows in gnome-shell to prevent artifacts when in fullscreen.
frozen.longDescription:
Disables unredirect fullscreen windows in gnome-shell to prevent artifacts when in fullscreen.

This version makes sure the unredirect option is not re-enabled automatically by the shell.
